main event: An observer reported seeing a bright light, approximately the size of a car, traveling at a high rate of speed in Farmville, Virginia on 6/11/1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 10 minutes before it suddenly disappeared., The object emitted no sound during the sighting., The observer speculated that the object might have been a satellite or a meteor., The sighting was described as visually clear with no physical evidence recovered., The object's flight path was recorded but no additional data was available.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
